alert.note: Alert for La Plata; Montezuma (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued April 18 at 4:10PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR BLOWING DUST FROM 330 PM TUESDAY UNTIL 800 PM TUESDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Blowing Dust. WHERE...Montezuma, La Plata, Saguache, Alamosa, and Custer Counties. Locations include, but are not limited to Cortez, Durango, Saguache, Alamosa, and Westcliffe. WHEN...330 PM Tuesday April 18 to 800 PM Tuesday April 18 IMPACTS...Strong and gusty winds will produce areas of blowing dust on Tuesday. The threat for blowing dust will gradually diminish by Tuesday evening. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
